item.title: Unsupervised Learning to Cluster Well Log Data into Facies
Loading and Displaying Well Log Data from LAS Files with Python
item.description: Anyone who has worked or is currently working within the oil and gas industry will understand that there are a large variety of formats that well log data can be stored in. Some of the common formats that we as petrophysicists work with include LAS, ASCII and CSV files.
